title: Poster, 2010-21-9, 1992
provenance: Acquired from dealers, galleries and auction houses by Marc Benda.  Remained with Benda until 2010, when gifted to CHNDM.
creditline: Gift of Sara and Marc Benda
description: On the left, taking up the entire height of the poster, is a green-toned black-and-white photograph of a man's face. On the right is an insert of a telescopic image of stars. Layered over these is a cartoon depiction of a blue globe encircled by orange cars, and a hand, apparently a newspaper cut-out, pointing to the globe and framing the eye of the man. At top, is the inscription: "NOC NA ZIEMI a film JIMA JARMUSCHA / night on earth muzyaka TOM WAITS / produkcja JVC-LOCUS SOLUS".
